info.title: Do Quintal à Cozinha API
info.description: API for managing rural women producers' products, profiles, and media. This platform connects producers from MMTR-SE with consumers.

tags.name: Product
tags.description: Product management endpoints (CRUD operations with media support)

tags.name: Recipe
tags.description: Recipe management endpoints (CRUD operations with steps and media support)

post.summary: Create a new product with optional media
post.description: Creates a new product for a producer. Optionally accepts an array of media items (images, audio, video). This operation uses a database transaction to ensure atomicity - if any step fails, the entire operation is rolled back and no data is saved.

description.example: Queijo artesanal feito com leite de cabra

price.description: Optional product price in Brazilian Real (R$)

phone_number.description: Phone number of the producer (must match an existing profile)

media.description: Optional array of media items to attach to the product

url.description: Public URL to the media file

value.description: Queijo artesanal feito com leite de cabra
Mel puro extraído de colmeias silvestres

description.example: Queijo artesanal feito com leite de cabra

data.description: Queijo artesanal feito com leite de cabra

value.error: Media item at index 0: media_type must be one of "IMAGE", "AUDIO", "VIDEO"
Media item at index 0: url is required and must be a non-empty string
Price must be a positive number

error.example: Failed to create product. Transaction rolled back.

get.summary: Get product(s) by ID or phone number
get.description: Retrieves a single product by product_id, or all products associated with a producer's phone_number. At least one query parameter must be provided. If product_id is provided, returns a single product object. If phone_number is provided, returns an array of all products for that producer.

parameters.name: product_id
parameters.description: UUID of the specific product to retrieve

parameters.name: phone_number
parameters.description: Phone number of the producer to retrieve all products for

description.example: Queijo artesanal feito com leite de cabra

oneOf.description: Array of products (when phone_number is provided)

data.description: Queijo artesanal feito com leite de cabra
Queijo artesanal feito com leite de cabra
Mel puro extraído de colmeias silvestres

400.description: Bad request - missing required query parameter

error.example: Enter at least one of the attributes between phone_number and product_id in search params.

put.description: Updates a product's information and/or manages its media. All fields are optional - only provided fields will be updated. The `replace_media` flag controls media behavior: when false (default), new media is added to existing media; when true, all existing media is removed before adding new media. This operation uses a database transaction to ensure atomicity.

parameters.name: product_id
parameters.description: UUID of the product to update

description.example: Queijo artesanal premium feito com leite de cabra orgânico

price.description: Updated product price in Brazilian Real (R$)

media.description: Media items to add (or replace if replace_media is true)

url.description: Public URL to the media file

replace_media.description: If true, removes all existing media before adding new media. If false (default), adds new media to existing media.

updateNameAndAddMedia.summary: Update name and add new media (keep existing)

replaceAllMedia.summary: Replace all media with new media

value.description: Queijo artesanal premium feito com leite de cabra orgânico de nossa fazenda

description.example: Queijo artesanal premium feito com leite de cabra orgânico

media.description: All media associated with the product after update

added_media_count.description: Number of new media items added in this update

data.description: Queijo artesanal premium feito com leite de cabra orgânico

value.error: Media item at index 0: media_type must be one of "IMAGE", "AUDIO", "VIDEO"
Media item at index 0: url is required and must be a non-empty string
Price must be a positive number

error.example: Failed to update product. Transaction rolled back.

delete.description: Permanently deletes a product from the database. This operation automatically cascades to remove all ProductMedia links associated with the product. Media files themselves are preserved in the Media table for potential reuse by other products.

parameters.name: product_id
parameters.description: UUID of the product to delete

post.summary: Create a new recipe with optional media and steps
post.description: Creates a new recipe for a producer. Accepts title, description, times, servings, difficulty, ingredients (array of strings), and optional media/steps arrays. Uses a database transaction to ensure atomicity.

phone_number.description: Phone number of the producer (must match an existing profile)

description.example: Traditional Brazilian fish stew from Bahia

get.summary: Get recipe(s) by ID or phone number
get.description: Retrieves a single recipe by recipe_id, or all recipes associated with a producer's phone_number

parameters.name: recipe_id
parameters.description: UUID of the specific recipe to retrieve

parameters.name: phone_number
parameters.description: Phone number of the producer to retrieve all recipes for

put.summary: Update recipe details, steps, and/or media
put.description: Updates a recipe's information with smart step merging (updates existing by step_number, adds new ones). All fields are optional.

parameters.name: recipe_id
parameters.description: UUID of the recipe to update

steps.description: Steps to update/add (smart merge by step_number)

replace_media.description: If true, removes all existing media before adding new media

delete.description: Permanently deletes a recipe. Cascades to RecipeStep and RecipeMedia.
Permanently deletes a media file and removes its association with the recipe

post.description: Creates a new profile for a rural woman producer. The phone_number must be unique and will be used as the primary identifier for the profile. This profile is required before creating products.

phone_number.description: Phone number of the producer (must be unique)

minimalProfile.summary: Create profile with required fields only

get.summary: Get producer profile by phone number
get.description: Retrieves a producer's profile information using their phone number as the identifier.

put.description: Updates a producer's profile information. All fields are optional - only provided fields will be updated. The phone_number in the path is used to identify the profile and cannot be changed.

delete.description: Permanently deletes a producer's profile from the database. This operation automatically cascades to remove all products associated with the profile.
Permanently deletes a media file from the database and removes its association with the product. This operation cannot be undone.

parameters.name: media_id
parameters.description: UUID of the media to delete

get.description: Redirects the user to a WhatsApp conversation with the producer. If a product ID is provided, includes a pre-filled message about that specific product. If a profile ID is provided, includes a generic greeting message. This endpoint performs a 302 redirect to the WhatsApp web/app URL.

parameters.name: product
parameters.description: UUID of the product to inquire about

parameters.name: profile
parameters.description: UUID of the producer profile to contact

error.example: Product ID or Profile ID is required

404.description: Product, profile, or phone number not found

get.description: Redirects the user to their default email client with a pre-filled recipient and optional subject line. This endpoint performs a 302 redirect to a mailto: URL. The recipient email is configured in the site configuration and never exposed in the frontend.

parameters.name: subject
parameters.description: Subject line for the email (optional, defaults to 'Contato via site')

post.description: Transcribes audio files to text using Groq's Whisper large-v3-turbo model. Optimized for Brazilian Portuguese but supports multiple languages. Requires a publicly accessible audio file URL.

url.description: Public URL to the audio file

language.description: Language code for transcription (default: 'pt' for Portuguese)

withoutLanguage.summary: Transcribe with automatic language (defaults to pt)

data.description: Groq Whisper API response with transcription

text.description: Transcribed text from the audio file
text.example: Este é um queijo artesanal feito com leite de cabra, produzido em nossa propriedade rural.

data.text: Este é um queijo artesanal feito com leite de cabra, produzido em nossa propriedade rural.

error.example: Method not allowed. Use POST instead.
